name: Alike Area
description:
Made by: MS ANNOTATION X
Music by: Coyote Hearing

A 2D platformer made for LOWREZJAM 2020.

Game's theme: Parallel Universe.

In this game, the left's chapters of the game, are the same as the right's chapters of the game. The level of each chapter of the game is different. (To understand more you need to play the game.)

Controls:
A/D, Q/D or Left and Right arrow keys to move left or right
M - Menu
R - Reload
Esc - Exit Game
